titleStmt.title: The Passion of a discontented minde
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1566-1601.
Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V.S. for Iohn Baily, and are to be sold at his shop at the doore of the office of the vi clarks in Chancerie lane,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Nicholas Breton, Robert Devereux and Robert Southwell--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the doore of the office of the vi clarks in Chancerie lane
